name: BAMboo
description:
Play as a panda defending his bamboo forest from an army of soldiers! BAMboo is a rhythm game made by Video Game Development Club for our fall 2016 semester project. 

Use the U, I, O, and P keys to attack with your bamboo bo staff and hold they keys to deal with the spear wielding soldiers.

I was secondary sound team lead on this project and made the pause music.

Ambient Pause Music: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/ambient-pause-music

VGDC: https://vgdc.umn.edu/
